snippet.title: Amber Heard Sentenced In Court After Shocking Details Surface… | Celebrity Center
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Sentenced In Court After Shocking Details Surface… | Celebrity Center

Click HERE To Enter The GIVEAWAY! https://youtube.com/channel/UCEl7FPZZxo84xUTEKewsRng


More Videos:
Celebrities React To Jake Paul VS Tyron Woodley Fight
https://youtu.be/cWVrmmpJKyA

Jake Paul REACTS To Floyd Mayweather TRAINING Tyron Woodley
https://youtu.be/4FRXQDUFUMU

Jake Paul Reacts To Tyron Woodley's NEW Training Footage
https://youtu.be/N10nthKeu-I

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This…
https://youtu.be/s8XEA4tEMMI

The saga of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp’s messy divorce continues. But this
time things went really harsh for Amber Heard. According to the latest reports,
Amber Heard is at risk of facing jail time because now she is under
investigation by the LAPD for perjury concerning the 2016 incident in which
Depp allegedly hit his then-wife in the face. For now, Amber Heard is trying to
get the case dismissed officially.
I’m going to break it down for you, but before we start, hit that subscribe button
and make sure you stay till the end to know if the game is over for Amber
Heard.
After Johnny Deepp's defeat in the British High Court last year, his legal team
has plans to appeal. But this is more difficult than it seems because Amber
Heard’s legal team has tried to get the U.S.-based lawsuit dismissed, arguing
that the findings in the U.K. libel suit should be adopted. As for Johnny Depp’s
lawyer? He’s calling it a “hail Mary.”
Apparently, Amber Heard's legal team doesn't want to give up without a fight
and they've filed a motion to stay discovery on the defamation claims and also a
memorandum in support of her motion for leave. Her team believes that due to
the libel case results, which found in favor of The Sun after that outlet called
Johnny Depp a “wife beater,” that the judgment rendered should be applicable
in the US as well. The motion reads:
With the finality of the Judgment, rendered after Mr. Depp presented his best
evidence and arguments on the exact same factual issues assessed here, Mr.
Depp should be precluded from seeking yet another bite of the apple, where he
has fully adjudicated his dispute and lost. Because of the UK Judgment, the
entire world may now say, forever, that Mr. Depp is a ‘wife beater’ and has
committed at least 12 acts of domestic violence against Amber Heard, causing
her to be in fear for her life. In short, the UK Judgement, now final, permits this
court to end the litigation.
According to Johnny Depp’s lawyer, Benjamin Chew, however, this is not the
first time Amber Heard’s legal team has tried to get the $50 million defamation.

Let us know in the comments below, be sure to subscribe and we’ll see you next time on the channel!
